requestBody: {"input":[{"content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with access to weather data and code execution.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"text":"What's the weather in Tokyo? Also calculate 15 * 23 using code.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"user"}],"model":"gpt-5-nano","max_output_tokens":200,"stream":false,"tools":[{"name":"get_weather","description":"Get current weather for a location","parameters":{"required":["location"],"type":"object","properties":{"location":{"type":"string","description":"The city and country, e.g. 'Tokyo, Japan'"}}},"type":"function"},{"parameters":{"properties":{"container":{"description":"Container for code execution","type":"string"}},"type":"object","required":["container"]},"type":"code_interpreter"}]}
notes: Function call (weather) and code interpreter in non-streaming mode
